bool validFor (  const UserRight *  right,
const ClientSetting *  clientSetting
) 
 

Checks if right should be skipped for this client type.

Currently checks if life time Gold rights should be skipped.

Parameters:
right The right to check.
clientType The client settings, if NULL then this method returns false.
Returns:
True if right should not be used for the client type.
